original_title: A Monster Inside Me 4: Return To Rio
overview: In 2011 Matthias von Fistenberg went to Rio de Janeiro and found some of the biggest-dicked Brazilian Tops and tattooed stud bottoms south of the equator. What came was the birth of one of the most popular series in the Raw Fuck Club franchise, A Monster Inside Me. Now, Matthias has gone back to Rio for what makes the 4th installment in that franchise. Monster 4: Return to Rio features 5 scenes, 7 models, a 4 way orgy, and yes, mega-inches of raw-fucking Brazilian meat. Lube up good -- your gonna need it for these Monsters.
title: A Monster Inside Me 4: Return To Rio
